content: वर्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वृ-यत्] {@--1@} To be chosen or selected, eligible. {@--2@} Best, most excellent, chief, principal (mostly at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); अन्वीतः स कतिपयैः किरातवर्यैः <ls>Ki. 12. 54.</ls> --र्यः The god of love. --र्या {@--1@} A girl choosing her own husband. {@--2@} A girl in general.
